node.text:
Floating through Ashtanga’s Sun Salutations. 
If you like the drumbeat, you can get it at www.DavidRobsonYoga.com, and if you like the count with the drum, there’s also a Led Primary to the drumbeat. Warning! ⚠️ it’s super hard! 💀
.

Wearing @sulawear .
.

#ashtanga #ashtangayoga #onebreathatatime #ashtangatoronto #yogajourney #yoga #yogi  #mysoretoronto #instayoga #yogainspiration #igyoga #learntofloat #yogachallenge #learntofall #ashtangayogato #dontsmashyourface #breathingmovingsystem #intermediateseries #vinyasa #alignment

node.text:
An in-depth look at the vinyasa and alignment of Ashtanga’s #UtthitaParsvakonasana A&B, Extended Side Angle Pose, demonstrated by @vesic_jelena
-
🎥 @rubenlew 🙏
-
Check out our video on Ashtanga’s Fundamental Postures. The video explains:
•The traditional vinyasa counts and movements for each of the Fundamental Asanas
•The Tristhana (Three Places of Attention) for each count and posture
•Alignment cues and information to deepen your experience of the postures

Ultimately, the video is about much more than just the vinyasas and postures–  it’s about using precision and detail to help us tap into Ashtanga’s powerful technique of moving meditation.
⭐️https://www.davidrobsonyoga.com/product/perfecting-fundamentals-ashtanga-online-video/ ⭐️⭐️
-
I’m wearing @yogacrow and Jelena’s wearing @sulawear 🙏
-
#ashtanga #yogatutorial #yogawithdavid&jelena #vinyasa #alignment #yoga #sideanglepose #ashtangayoga

node.title: Ashtanga Yoga Tutorial w/David Robson & Jelena Vesic on Extended Side Angle

node.text:
Here’s an excerpt from a workshop at @ubudyogacentre. I’m demonstrating the vinyasa for Ashtanga’s Trikonasa A&B. By getting rid of the extra movements we create more structure and focus in the Sadhana.
-

node.text:
During our weekend workshop in Guadalajara with @ashtanga108, @vesic_jelena and I had the chance to shoot with the amazing @rubenlew. We made a bunch of tutorials for IGTV, and we’ll be posting them over the next few days.
.
.
🎥 @rubenlew
.
.
#ashtanga #ashtangayoga #onebreathatatime #practiceandalliscoming #myyogalife #yogajourney #yoga #yogi  #mysoretoronto #yogaeverydamnday #instayoga #instagood #yogainspiration #igyoga #learntofloat #yogachallenge #learntofall #ashtangayogato #vasisthasana #vasis#shittygymnastics #dontsmashyourface #breathingmovingsystem

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by 𝕯𝖆𝖛𝖎𝖉 𝕽𝖔𝖇𝖘𝖔𝖓 𝖄𝖔𝖌𝖆 in Ashtanga Yoga Centre of Toronto with @davidrobsonyoga, @ashtangatoronto, and @vesic_jelena. May be an image of 2 people and text that says 'Mysore ed Primary Asana Workshops Pranayama Guided Meditation - Philosophy Talks Ashtanga Practice Intensive IN PERSON! with David and Jelena Date: October 9-15 Place: Ashtanga Yoga Centre of Toronto, Canada WWW.ASHTANGATORONTO.COM #'.

node.text:
📢 BIG NEWS -- Practice IN PERSON with us!⁣⁣
⁣⁣
We're excited to let you know about our new Ashtanga Practice Intensive from October 9th-15th @ashtangatoronto !⁣⁣
⁣⁣
During this week you'll have the opportunity to focus on and strengthen your practice with our guidance.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
🌱 𝐆𝐫𝐨𝐰 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐏𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐞⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Enjoy practicing alongside our dedicated AYCT students each morning. You'll receive verbal cues and hands-on assists to safely guide you through your practice with more awareness.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
📚 𝐄𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐊𝐧𝐨𝐰𝐥𝐞𝐝𝐠𝐞 ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
In this course you'll have the opportunity to take part in 8 workshops that cover many aspects of our daily sadhana plus pranayama, yoga philosophy and more.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
*𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐢𝐬 𝐥𝐢𝐦𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐨 𝟏𝟒 𝐬𝐭𝐮𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬*⁣⁣
⁣⁣
🐣 Early Bird Sale on now until September 25th!⁣⁣
⁣⁣
>> 𝘊𝘭𝘪𝘤𝘬 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘭𝘪𝘯𝘬 𝘪𝘯 𝘮𝘺 𝘣𝘪𝘰 𝘵𝘰 𝘭𝘦𝘢𝘳𝘯 𝘮𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘵𝘰 𝘳𝘦𝘨𝘪𝘴𝘵𝘦𝘳.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
If you have any questions send us an email at info@ashtangatoronto.com⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Hope to see you there!

.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#ashtanga #ashtangayoga #ashtangatoronto #ashtangacourse #yogaintensive #yogapracticr #yogaworkshop #ashtangato #practiceyoga #yogateacher #yogacommunity #yogapractice

node.text:
JANUSIRSASANA C

In this week's #AshtangaMondays we’re looking at Janusirsasana C, the third Head to Knee Pose, aka the Toe Crusher😅, from Ashtanga’s Primary Series.

Nothing too fancy here— just showing the setup for the pose. As always, I hope you find this useful🙏

Want to learn Ashtanga with me and @vesic_jelena online? The Fall season of our E-sangha begins September 4th!

With this membership you'll get: 
• Weekly Virtual Mysore
• Weekly Led Primary
• Weekly Meditation 
• Monthly Practice Clinic
• Monthly Conference 
☆ Bonus: member exclusive perks and discounts!

Sign up before Wednesday, August 18th to save 10% off the 3-month membership.

Click the link in my bio for the full details.

🎥 @kat.Ashtanga
🎶 @tristan.arp

Join in on #AshtangaMondays! And make sure to check out always beautiful demos and useful tips from @sirisyoga and @lottasebzdayoga and @vesic_jelena.⁣

⁣#yogatutorials #yogamotivation #ashtanga #yogatips #yogateacher #asanapractice #yogavideo #yogainspiration #practiceyoga #yogapractice #yogaalignment #yogabasics #learnyoga #yoga #movement #asana #vinyasa #fitness #fitfam

2 WAYS TO DO A SUN SALUTATION 

Here is Suryanamaskara A, the Sun Salutation, as it’s done in Ashtanga Yoga. I’m showing 2 different approaches, but both have the same intention: calm and steady focus embodied in movement.

The beauty of a yoga practice is that you need very little to get started: Just some clothes that let you move freely, and a mat with good grip.

I’m wearing @jednorthyoga shorts, my favourite Canadian brand. Right now they’re having an ⭐️ Up To 80% Off Anniversary Sale until Aug 14!Check them out 👍

My beautiful mat is @liforme , and you can get 10% off when you use discount code DAVIDROBSON

node.text:
🚀 JUST LAUNCHED -- E-Sangha Fall Membership!
September, October, November 2021

Maintaining your home practice is much easier when you're guided by experienced teachers and surrounded by the support of others who share a passion for the practice, a sangha.

The aim of our E-Sangha is just that. To build an online community for Ashtanga students from all over the world to come together to learn and connect inside a supportive community.

The E-sangha Membership includes: 
• Virtual Mysore
• Led Primary
• Guided Meditation 
• Practice Clinic
• Conference
☆ Bonus: member exclusive offers and discounts!

One month and 3 month membership options available.

✨ Check out the full details and schedule by clicking the link in my bio.

---

FAQ's

What if I can't make the live class(es)?
• No worries. We record and upload each class for easy playback whenever works best for you. (Mysore excluded)

How long do I have access to the recordings?
• You will have access to the membership area for 2 weeks past the last live class date of your membership. 

Hope you will join us!

.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
